Album Review

The Better Life, 3 Doors Down&#039;s debut album, positions them somewhere between radio-ready post-grunge and more aggressive alternative metal. The best songs are memorable exercises in that style, and even though the songwriting is uneven, that&#039;s often to be expected from a first record; there is at least an indication of potential here.
